      Inside the Infecticon mid atlantic base, Vampiza, Frostbite, Blight, 
and Hooligan all kneel admidst an aechyway the glows ominously. It goes from 
purple to orange, and then to black before a bright light erupts from it 
blinding everyone for a few seconds. Once the flash has subsided, inside the 
arch way stands a robot, energy crackling over its body with nothing but a 
black visor for eyes. It looks down at those gathered before it as each 
quivers in fear.

????: "Your pregress here greatly displeases me... now that I am here none of 
you are needed... but one shall be destroyed in body... and mind."

The robot then points to Vampiza who gulps and stands. A second later he is 
surrounded by a green glow while at th same time, in his room Hellpeon is 
also surrounded in a green glow. A cry of pain is then released from 
Vampiza's mouth as he seemingly dissapears. Back in the Oteybis Hellpeon also 
lets out a cry of pain before floating into the air... limp. A field of red 
crystal then surrounds his body, doing what... is unknown. The robot then 
looks to the others and laughs evily.

????: "Prepare the cannon for firing. It is time we show these ingrates what 
we have..."

With those words the being walks past the others and towards the control room 
as the others just continue to kneel, frozen in fear.

--part1_cc.457ab6.28ff4027_boundary
